text:
April 21, 19&
Mr. Harvey Unna
Chandos House
Palmer Street
London SWT, England
Dear Hr. Unna:
2fcst of the programs distributed by the
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
are those obtained on an exchange basis within the
membership. As an organization, we have produced
so roe series of broadcasts but are not so engaged
at the present time. If we again get into some
more elaborate productions, I shall keep your kind
offer in mind.
Sincerely yours,
FESsjs
Frank E. Schooley
Treasurer
